name: Crystal Core (itch) (Thomas Bringer)
description:
Dig deeper and deeper to reach the crystal at the core of the planet!

Seek places to dig using your sensor, and avoid the underground's hazards!

Note: Some visual effects aren't supported by WebGL, that is why download is required.

Made in 48 hours by Thomas Bringer for Ludum Dare 48 (Theme: Deeper and deeper)
